original_text: “If a thief is caught breaking in at night and is struck a fatal blow, the defender is not guilty of bloodshed;
korean_text: 도둑이 뚫고 들어오는 것을 보고 그를 쳐죽이면 피 흘린 죄가 없으나

sentences.original_text: If a thief is caught breaking in at night
and is struck a fatal blow
the defender is not guilty of bloodshed
